title: Yvonne Dold-Samplonius
summary: Yvonne Dold-Samplonius (20 May 1937 â€“ 16 June 2014) was a Dutch mathematician and historian who specialized in the history of Islamic mathematics during the Middle age. She was particularly interested in the mathematical methods used by Islamic architects and builders of the Middle Ages for measurements of volumes and measurements of religious buildings or in the design of muqarnas.
